title: Is leaving pixel 4xl on a pixel stand for long periods of time reduces the life of the battery?
content:
It is a very nice feature that Pixel 4XL becomes a full functioning Google Assistant while it is on the wireless charger (Pixel Stand); However, there is no information regarding to the effects of exposure  the battery to the wireless charger station for long periods of time. Is it safe for the smartphone and its battery to leave a device on the charging station for long periods of time. E.g. full day / night?

Thank you.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
